thread.section_title: Hotel Michelet Odeon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unique boutique
thread.title_full: Unique boutique - Review of Hotel Michelet Odeon, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JBarWTX
title: Unique boutique
text: We also had the top floor family room (for 4, which is hard to find) and found it quite unique. Although the floor was slanted (I think the room was added on the roof) it had very good beds and large bath. The view was perfect for our one night stay. The staff was very friendly and accommodating and we really enjoyed our visit. The location was very centralized and close to Notre Dame and the Louvre. All in all, we would go back.
